las-vegas.neighborhoods: The Strip, Downtown, Summerlin, Henderson (adjacent), Paradise, The Lakes
las-vegas.meetingHighlights: Large, active fellowship with meetings across the Strip, downtown, and suburbs; many speaker nights and 24-hour resources for newcomers.
las-vegas.transitInfo: RTC buses and the Las Vegas monorail cover central areas; McCarran International Airport (LAS) provides major air service.

north-las-vegas.meetingHighlights: Suburban meetings with evening and weekend options; many groups collaborate with Las Vegas central fellowship.
north-las-vegas.transitInfo: RTC buses serve North Las Vegas with links to Las Vegas and Henderson.

reno.neighborhoods: Downtown, Midtown, Old Southwest, Arlington, South Reno, North Valleys
reno.meetingHighlights: Regional meetings serving the Reno–Tahoe area with a mix of weekday and weekend groups, Big Book studies, and speaker events.
reno.transitInfo: RTC Washoe buses serve Reno; Reno–Tahoe International Airport provides regional flights and highway access to Lake Tahoe.

henderson.neighborhoods: Green Valley, Downtown Henderson, Lake Las Vegas
henderson.meetingHighlights: Suburban meetings popular with families and commuters; many evening and newcomer-friendly groups.
henderson.transitInfo: RTC provides regional bus service connecting Henderson to Las Vegas; proximity to McCarran International Airport.

carson-city.meetingHighlights: Capital-city meetings with steady weekday attendance and small-community support networks.
carson-city.transitInfo: Local bus services and proximity to Reno via US-395; regional airports serve the area.

sparks.neighborhoods: Old Town, Victorian Square, Sparks Marina
sparks.meetingHighlights: Shared meeting resources with Reno; active neighborhood and downtown meetings.
sparks.transitInfo: Regional buses link Sparks with Reno; quick highway access via I-80.
